attributes.action: Ban the use of 0870 phone numbers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I recently spent nearly an hour (over 4 calls) on a travel companies 0870 phone number & only listened to music but I never spoke to an operator, which to me is a total waste of my time & money. OFCOM, ICSTIS, ABTA can do nothing about it & even my local trading standards say there is nothing covering this. So sign up, & if you can, give me anywhere else I can go to pursue this.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/cheapercalls/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
